question: Nestle chocolates..contains ethyl alcohol.is it haram?
answer:
QUESTION
I had called up the nestle chocolate costumer survice to ask whether their chocolates smarties& others contain any animal ingredients or alcohol.they said that in artifcial flavours there is corn based ethyl alcohol but its evoparated ....All nestle chocolates contains the same..can we have these chocolates.Also what about vanilla.I have heard that it too contains ethyl alcohol.can we add vanilla essence while preparing cookies.can we have vanilla ice cream?
ANSWER


Share:
If chocolates and vanilla essence contain corn based ethyl alcohol, then it is Halaal.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
